name: Super Legends of Smash Fantasy
description:
A normal day until your son turns to stone before your very eyes. Any hope of saving him rests in the hands of a witch just north of town...

Theme: "We did everything adults would do. What went wrong?" - William Golding

Mechanic: Puzzle.

There is a PC build available for offline purposes.
